title: Sine and Cosine - finding a coordinate

content.question: The points (3 comma 0) and (0 comma 3) are indicated on the circle. The angle in standard position is labeled A. The initial ray passes through the point (3 comma 0) on the circle. The terminal ray passes through a point on the circle labeled P in the second quadrant. ​The figure shows an angle of measure <math alttext="A"><semantics><mi>A</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in standard position in the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane. At point <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, the terminal ray of the angle intersects a circle centered at the origin. If angle <math alttext="A"><semantics><mi>A</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> measures <math alttext="fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator 3 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> radians, what is the <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-coordinate of <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="negative fraction numerator 3 square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="negative fraction numerator square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
